result.arabic_text: ۞ وَلَوۡ رَحِمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرّٖ لَّلَجُّواْ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
result.translation: 75.Ama koros keenih Racmatneeh, qabar kee qululuk keenil tanim fayya keenik hayinninoy koroosannuu kee sinni caddok taturut amo ayxeerak yenen badit kee agay-waagat anuk.
